data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of San Luis to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Luis, Argentina
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of San Luis.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 301,883 people in the state of San Luis who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of San Luis words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 367,900 people living in San Luis through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 40,664 believers in San Luis, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of San Luis, Argentina has a population of 367,900.

We estimate San Luis has 40,664 people who might know Jesus, 301,883 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,353 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in San Luis to agree with you and with one another.
